info.name: Smart Restaurant API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Smart Restaurant Backend.

**Base URL:** `http://localhost:4000/api`

**Authentication:**
- Most admin/staff endpoints require Bearer token
- Login first to get token, then use it in Authorization header

**Default Admin Credentials:**
- Email: admin@restaurant.com
- Password: admin123
